body.p:
Owensboro' Ky. May 19th 64
Hon. Thomas E. Bramlett
Dr Sir --

Permit us the pleasure of introducing to you our young friend Robert Allen -- He has been in the service of his country, and was a member and officer in the "17th Ky" but owing to sickness was honorably discharged -- Having recovered his strength, he looks to the war path again and visits Frankfort to consult our patriotic Governor as to the best place for him to fill in maintaining our glorious country --
We hope you will aid him in his purpose --

Truly your friends
W, Anthony
Wm B Wall
J. W. Compton
Surgeon Brd Enrolment 2nd Dist Ky
N B Allen Comr. Brd.
Enrolment 2d Dist
John R Grissom Ky.
Pro War 2nd
Dist Ky
